start builder section

start column
ABOUT
Celebrate the Best Years of Your Life
Enjoy your golden years in this age-qualified community surrounded by friendly neighbors on a well-maintained property. Magnolia Hill in Plant City, Florida offers a safe, more affordable housing option than other 55+ communities in larger metropolitan areas nearby. Hillsborough is the fourth largest county in Florida where Plant City resides, so you’re never short on things to do!
end column
end container
end section
Option-1:
Option-2:
start Slider JS
start builder section
start container
start column
end column
end container
start column
Close Proximity to Exciting Attractions
Our property is just 25 minutes east of Tampa where you’ll discover the ever-popular Busch Gardens and Florida Aquarium. Just 70 miles west, you’ll arrive in Orlando where world-class attractions await such as Universal Studios, SeaWorld, Adventure Island, and nearby Disney World.
Importantly, Magnolia Hill is located just a short distance to medical care facilities such as Bay Care Medical Group, South Florida Baptist Hospital, Urgent Care USA, and Women’s Care Florida.
If you’re seeking a quiet residential community with great amenities, mature shade trees, and near proximity to the perks of city life, you’ll love our charming community!
end column
end container
end section
